name: Asset Dispatched Report - IT
query:
SELECT
    ar.name AS 'Asset Request Name',
    ar.emp_name AS 'Emp Name',
    ar.date AS 'Request Date',
    ar.delivered_date AS 'Delivered Date',
    ar.branch AS 'Branch',
    ar.employee_department AS 'Department',
    ar.division AS 'Division',
    ar.status AS 'Employee Status',
    ar.emp_received_remark AS 'Employee Received Remark',
    al.mode_of_transport AS 'Dispatched Mode',
    al.dispatched_status AS 'Dispatched Status',
    al.item_name AS 'Item Name',
    al.quantity AS 'Quantity',
    ar.select_department AS 'Request to'
FROM
    `tabAsset Request` AS ar
LEFT JOIN
    `tabAsset List` AS al
ON
    ar.name = al.parent
WHERE
    ar.select_department = 'IT'
    AND ar.status = 'Delivered'
    AND al.dispatched_status = 'Dispatch'
    AND ar.delivered_date >= '2023-12-01' 
    AND ar.delivered_date <= '2024-02-29';
